title: Exactly what I need
comment: Material design, no ads, and simple app. Thx for the dev :) But plz fix the black round timer circle.

title: Very bad ! But
comment: The theme is very good, i like it very much. But the timer circle is full black, so i can't see the time of recording... Please fix this error, add more settings
On my phone, the sound quality of the recording is extremely bad. Hard to really use its so bad. Love the look of the app though.

title: Useful
comment: As others have mentioned, very convenient and I use it all the time in lectures!

title: Simple, quick, beautiful.
comment: The developer posted this to /r/android on Reddit and asked for feedback. Developers who care about their apps and are looking for critique are the ones I want to support. It records using a standard codec which can be used on any other media player. I hope the developer takes some of the suggestions given to improve the app but its currently my favorite recording app for its simplicity, functionality and aesthetics.

title: Great
comment: Though some material design animals would make it even better...

title: Very Good
comment: Very convientent and easy to use
